code: import React from'react';import'./Switch.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Switch=_ref=>{let{checked,onChange,leftLabel='Patient View',rightLabel='Physician View',className='',disabled=false}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"switch-container ".concat(className),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{className:"switch-label",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:checked,onChange:onChange,disabled:disabled,"aria-label":"Toggle between patient and physician view"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"switch-slider"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"switch-labels",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"switch-label-left ".concat(!checked?'active':''),children:leftLabel}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"switch-label-right ".concat(checked?'active':''),children:rightLabel})]})]})});};export default Switch;
